snippet.title: Stunt coordinators from 'Spider-Man,' 'Dark Knight,' and more talk worst on-set injuries
snippet.description: "I don't think it's anything to be proud of, being hurt," says Amazing Spider-Man stunt coordinator Andy Armstrong. "It's invariably a mistake, something gone wrong,...

snippet.title: Summer's (Real) Action Heroes
snippet.description: It's the season of big-screen pyrotechnics and daredevil action. But behind every high-flying star is an unseen wizard pulling the strings Â— literally. We talked to the stunt coordinators for five high-profile new flicks about what it takes to leap, fall, crash, and explode on film without getting (too) hurt
